description:
when i logged in my devstack environment and clicked "servers"of “system panel”,
i got this errorr:could't find availability_zones list
then i had a look at n-api.log,i got this :

comments.content:

comments.content:
@Fahri Cihan Demirci (cihand)
I'v found my error caused by the edition of nova/nova/cmd/__init__.py when debugging.
when I used "eventlet.monkey_patch(os=False)" and restarted nova-api service ,it worked!

import eventlet

from nova import debugger

if debugger.enabled():
    # turn off thread patching to enable the remote debugger
    eventlet.monkey_patch(os=False, thread=False)
else:
    eventlet.monkey_patch(os=False)
   #eventlet.monkey_patch(os=False,thread=False)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~838406598-k

comments.content: Yes, that's the way I see that file on my installation. So this problem was related with an error in starting the nova-api service. Since you have found a solution for your problem and it didn't have to do with nova code per se, I am marking this bug as invalid. Thank you for working on your problem and reporting your findings.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cihand
